txt.en: Ailing Stout-axes can be found in the Hall Under the Mountain.\n\nYou have gathered 'healing draughts' for the ailing Stout-axes and should now deliver them.
You have aided the ailing Stout-axes.
You have done well to aid the ailing Stout-axes in Erebor, and eased the ills of their long journey north from Mordor.

'It is nice to rest after such a long journey, but a few among us still feel the ills of travelling north from Mordor.

'I think they could do with a 'healing draught' or two, if you understand my meaning.

'I am certain a fine draught of ale and your company shall be enough to aid them!'
Collected dried cloaks for ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
With a few of his folk ailing from the long journey to Erebor, Náth hopes to raise their spirits.
Collect dried cloaks for ailing Stout-axes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Healing draughts' can be found on feasting tables in the Hall Under the Mountain.\n\nNáth hopes to help the remaining ailing Stout-axes by giving them 'healing draughts'.
